price: 60. Ne vous ai-Je pas enjoint, ô fils d’Adam, de ne point adorer Satan, qui est votre ennemi avéré,
arabic: ۞ أَلَمۡ أَعۡهَدۡ إِلَيۡكُمۡ يَٰبَنِيٓ ءَادَمَ أَن لَّا تَعۡبُدُواْ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنَۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمۡ عَدُوّٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: alam aʿhad ilaykum yābanī ādama an lā taʿbudū al-shayṭāna innahu lakum ʿaduwwun mubīnun
